contentfulBlogPost.title: Parkdale Community Health Centre Donation Recap

Items included blankets, towels, and hand sanitizers all of which were donated from the GTA community.\n","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Presidents Tiffany and Syeda led the donation and spoke to Anthony, a health centre representative about barriers to homelessness.
